__e: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Your parents are coming all the way from India, and the only person you invited to meet them is the office idiot?
I just told Leo about my affair, and he left me, so I am going to India, and by the way, you're dead to me.
I had given you a ticket to India and set you free
The only thing India's good for is losing weight.
India is my country and my faith... and I can die for my faith and my country... as readily as you for yours.
Is that what you think, too, that India is the place to go for a simple woman?
